doc:
Richard Greene https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Greene 0 Richard Marius Joseph Greene (25 August 1918 – 1 June 1985) was a noted English film and television actor. A matinée idol who appeared in more than 40 films, he was perhaps best known for the lead role in the long-running British TV series The Adventures of Robin Hood, which ran for 143 episodes from 1955 to 1959. Richard_Marius_Joseph_Greene ( 25_August_1918 – 1_June_1985 ) was a_noted_English_film_and_television_actor . A_matinée_idol who appeared in more_than_40_films , he was_perhaps_best_known for the_lead_role in the_long-running_British_TV_series The_Adventures of Robin_Hood , which ran for 143_episodes from 1955 to 1959 .
